file_content.text: I'm clear. Theron, prepare the omnicannon. Lana, status update.
We're on our way to the Gravestone. We waited for Senya as long as we could...
I'm alive... but I won't be joining you.
What do you mean? Where are you?
What? Why?
I'm not going to like this, am I?
Nothing is ever easy with you.
Tell me where you are.
I don't like your tone.
I'm in Arcann's personal shuttle. He's with me.
Arcann's dead. I stabbed him through the chest.
He's dead. I killed him.
Do not betray me, Senya.
This is your only warning.
Then the mission isn't over. Bring Arcann to the Gravestone so I can finish this.
Bring him to me.
He's gravely wounded, but given proper care, he'll survive.
I'm taking him.
That was never my intention, but I must do right by my family.
Justice has been served. It's time for atonement.
You can't be serious!
I won't let you do this!
He saved my life. He can be redeemed. Let me help Arcann become the man he was meant to be.
She's in your firing range, Commander. Shoot them down!
Shoot her!
You'll kill them both.
Senya, what are you doing?
Saving my son.
I won't shoot an unarmed ship. Arcann is no longer a threat. I'm trusting you, Senya.
[Let Arcann and Senya go]
Redemption isn't an option for Arcann--only death.
[Shoot Arcann and Senya down]
No!
Thank you, Commander. Your mercy will be remembered.
I'll do it myself!
No! How could you let them go? How?
Now's not the time for debate. Focus on the fleet.
The omnicannon's ready to fire on your command.
Do it.
Hello, old girl.
That was a little close, Theron!
Don't blame Theron. I took the shot.
Koth?
I'd love to stay and chat, but I've got a ship to steal. Your ship.
Let's not do anything rash. We can work this out.
We can talk this out.
Everyone is testing my patience today.
This isn't a good time.
You should've stayed away, Koth.
Bad move coming back.
And watch you destroy Zakuul from the sidelines? You're free because of me. I've got to make this right.
I'm sure you're thinking up all kinds of ways to kill me, but I'll be gone before you can act on them.
Know what happened to the last guy who stole my ship? I kicked him into a black hole. True story.
People who steal my ship die.
You'll have to catch me. And I'm the better pilot.
You never deserved the Gravestone.
Koth, don't do this. Koth--
He's gone... The Gravestone's gone.
Probably not.
You did the right thing.
Doesn't feel right.
Yeah, we're past talking.
You can keep your crew, though. I've got my own.
Ahhhh!
No! No! We let them get away!
Forget about them! SCORPIO still wants us dead! Focus on the fleet!
I still see both your shuttles flying out there. And zero enemies shooting at you. Maybe a little thanks is in order?
But Arcann and Senya got away! They're still alive out there. Am I the only one who realizes how bad that is?
How about we hold this bickering until we're all back on Odessen? It's been a very trying day.
Nice seeing you again. Fun working together, even if Arcann and Senya got away. But that's not really why I came back.
